answers.answer: Go for a routine check up for Blood pressure and Diabetes Melittus.As these are the common causes, check your blood haemoglobin and quit smoking.Try some vitamin B12 like Polybion etc. Take care and visit a Physician if you are diagnosed with anything for further treatment.
thank you sir, i went to blood chekup 2day, but don't have Diabtes, so which medicine is good for me .....plz reply as soon as possible

Take Polybion/Neurobion for 2 weeks, once a tablet at bed time and if it does not improve you have to visit a neurologist for examination. Eat healthy, take balanced diet, maintain your BMI & exercise. Take care!

title: my foot sole is burning
